description: Simon Coveney says people should not visit Ireland if they cannot curb their movements when they land.
title: Coronavirus: Tourists to Ireland 'must be able to isolate'
title_page: Coronavirus: Tourists to Ireland 'must be able to isolate' - BBC News
maintext: He said if a follow-up reveals people are not in the place where they said they would be staying, then they would have broken the law. He warned there are "severe penalties" for this.
